entry.string: The number of categories that you want displayed per page.
entry.translation: Zee noomber ooff cetegureees thet yuoo vunt deespleyed per pege-a.

entry.string: The categories can be navigated in an explorer style interface.
entry.translation: Zee cetegureees cun be-a nefeegeted in un ixplurer style-a interffece-a.

entry.string: Specify how many links you want to see per page.
entry.translation: Speceeffy hoo muny leenks yuoo vunt tu see-a per pege-a.

entry.string: Number of links shown in statistics
entry.translation: Noomber ooff leenks shoon in steteestics

entry.string: In many cases, you can see the item title if you want.
entry.translation: In muny ceses, yuoo cun see-a zee item teetle-a iff yuoo vunt. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Show the item title in statistics
entry.translation: Shoo zee item teetle-a in steteestics
